column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Chã das Caldeiras
#Text=Chã das Caldeiras - literally the Plateau of the Crater - is the area inside the original crater that created the island of Fogo 100000 years ago .
#Text=The villages of Portela and Bangaeria are effectively joined as they sprawl for a kilometer or two on the main road that crosses the crater .
#Text=The villagers live from the agriculture in the rich volcanic soil of the crater .
#Text=Grapes are used to made the excellent Fogo wine which must be tried .
#Text=Apples , pears , peaches and figs are also grown .
#Text=Get in
#Text=Aluguers
#Text=leave from São Filipe around noon .
#Text=You can also get a lift with Patrick , the proprietor of Pousada Pedra Brabo from his office above the market in São Filipe .
#Text=The pickup leaves from his downtown office around 11:00 for the 2-hour journey ( $ 500 ) .
#Text=Aluguers are around the same price but take around three hours due to frequent stops .
#Text=Getting back to São Filipe is similar with Patrick 's pickup leaving at 8:30 .
#Text=Aluguers leave earlier .
#Text=Alternatively , guides will arrange a full service trip including hints , explanations and a private taxi .
#Text=Do
#Text=The highlight of a trip to Fogo is climbing the Pico de Fogo .
#Text=Despite the imposing slopes , the climb is possible for anyone of moderate fitness who does n't mind a bit a rock scrambling .
#Text=Climbing Pico do Fogo without a guide is not allowed .
#Text=Prices start around $ 5000 for up to two persons .
#Text=Sturdy footwear is essential - no sandals !
#Text=High-top hiking boots are recommended , because of sharp-edged lava ash while going down .
#Text=Walking sticks might be helpful .
#Text=Take with you enough sun protection , snack and water .
#Text=Ideally you will want to spend two nights in Chã das Caldeiras .
#Text=Take a short walk in the afternoon and arrange a guide for the trip up the peak the following day .
#Text=An excursion starting at São Filipe is also possible with a taxi ( no meter - fix price ) and guide .
#Text=You start out for Chã das Caldeira very early in the morning .
#Text=You can either come back the same day or stay in Chã das Caldeira .
#Text=Another nice hike from Chã das Caldeira takes you through the fog forest towards Mosteiros .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Pousada Pedra Brabo .
#Text=is the finest place to eat and is open to non-residents .
#Text=There is a restaurant next to the tourist office which serves good fare .
#Text=Drink
#Text=Casa Ramires ( On the bend in the road near the tourist office ) .
#Text=This mini-market serves drinks in the evenings and is the place to hear local music .
#Text=Try the locally brewed red wine .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Pousada Pedra Brabo ( Opposite the concrete soccer pitch ) , ☏ +2382821521 , ✉ pedrabrabo@cvtelecom.cv .
#Text=A very pleasant guesthouse with 12 rooms surrounding a central courtyard .
#Text=Run by Patrick , a very friendly Frenchman who has lived in the volcano for almost a decade .
#Text=Rooms are clean and simple .
#Text=Bathrooms are shared .
#Text=3200$ double with breakfast .
#Text=Casa Marysa .
#Text=Associated with Pousada Pedra Brabo .
#Text=Accommodation is slightly simpler .
#Text=Stay safe
#Text=Be careful of loose rocks when hiking .
#Text=Climbing Pico do Fogo without a guide is not allowed due to safety restrictions .
